list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the part of the land near the sea; the edge of the land.
a run or movement in or on a vehicle without the use of power.
(of a person or vehicle) move easily without using power.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the engines stopped, and the craft coasted along
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các động cơ dừng lại, và thủ công nằm dọc theo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sail along the coast, especially in order to carry cargo.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he coasted down the eastern shore
